data.Name: Karen Flippo
data.staff_bio: Karen has 30+ years of experience in disability services including direct service, program, project and organizational management, program evaluation, state and Federal government service, and education and training.  She has conducted training and technical assistance nationally and internationally.  Several of her previous positions include:  Training Associate, University of San Francisco and Virginia Commonwealth University; Vice President, Brain Injury Association of America, and Chief Executive Officer, National Association of Councils on Developmental Disabilities.  She is currently the Immediate Past President of CQL, Council on Quality and Leadership and is the State Teams Liaison for the Alliance for Full Participation.
data.staff_ed:
BA, American University
MRA, Rehabilitation Administration, University of San Francisco
